description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Roasted Pumpkin Quinoa Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken & Roasted Pumpkin Quinoa Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour half of the dressing over salad and mix through. Spoon onto a serving plate and arrange slices of chicken on top. Scatter with remaining almonds, pomegranate seeds and mint leaves. Drizzle with remaining dressing and enjoy.
